Historical Conflicts & Wars.name: Echoes of Valor: A Historical Conflict Quiz
Historical Conflicts & Wars.description: Test your knowledge of pivotal moments and figures in history's most significant conflicts. From Joan of Arc to the Line of Death, this quiz explores a range of wars and their impact.

questions.text: In what war did Joan of Arc fight?
During what war did Francis Scott Key write the words to 'The Star-Spangled Banner'?
Which one of these World War II leaders was not at the Yalta Conference?
During which war did US troops fight the Battle of New Orleans?
In 1986, Libyan leader Muammar Qaddafi drew a so-called 'Line of Death' over what body of water?
Which of these countries was not a member of the Axis nations during World War II?
Who led the 1831 slave insurrection in Southampton, Virginia?
Which one of these world leaders was assassinated?
